website_summaries.verdict: A smaller, more affordable option that doesn't skimp on quality.
pros: Chrome plated handles that won't get hot
Designed with Hydrolon non-stick, a non-toxic water based coating
Carbon steel, dimpled bottom for even heat distribution
Packaging is made from 70% recycled material
cons: This material and coating are thinner and flimsier than the more expensive models

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why so many questionable reviews here! I've used this pan 5/6 times and love it. Have had no issues with warping or nonstick coating coming off. If you put so much oil in your paella that it ruins the pan then I'm not sure you're making paella! I did however notice some scorching on the underside of the pan from my stove, but that's commonand does not effect cooking. This pan is 15" and works perfect with my recipe that uses 3 cups of rice, I wouldn't try to add any more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!!!

They no longer will give me my money back, but i figured I could at least warn you all about how low-quality these pans are. You can take a look at the photos I've provided to see just what I mean.

product_meta.title: Ecolution Sol Paella Pan – Eco-Friendly PFOA Free Hydrolon Non-Stick – Heavy Duty Carbon steel with Riveted Chrome Plated Handles – Dishwasher Safe – Limited – Black– 15” Diameter
product_meta.description: Born from our passion for cooking and concern for the planet, the Ecolution line of cookware offers a full range of kitchen tools. Not just a flash in the pan, Ecolution has been providing cookware from our family to yours for generations. Our Sol Paella Pan is crafted from durable and resilient heavy duty carbon steel, making it the perfect tool for creating your favorite Spanish meal! It features sturdy chrome plated handles that stay cool for easy use and it was designed with ecologically advanced Hydrolon non-stick, a water-based non-toxic coating that encourages healthy cooking. Like all Ecolution products, this pan is PFOA free and reflects our commitment to safe cookware for both you and the environment. Cook well, do good.
feature_bullets: QUALITY DESIGN: Crafted from durable and resilient heavy duty carbon steel, our Sol Paella Pan is the perfect tool for creating your favorite Spanish meal! It features sturdy chrome plated handles that stay cool for easy use and it was designed with ecologically advanced Hydrolon non-stick, a water-based non-toxic coating that encourages healthy cooking.

SUSTAINABILITY: Born from our passion for cooking and concern for the planet, the Ecolution line of cookware offers a full range of kitchen tools. All Ecolution products are quality made, and come in packaging consisting of 70% recycled material.
SAFE AND NON-TOXIC: Like all Ecolution cookware, this pan is PFOA free and reflects our commitment to safe kitchen accessories for both you and the environment.

USE AND CARE: Use only utensils safe for non-stick cookware. After cooking, allow the pan to cool on a heat-resistant surface. Do not pour hot water into the pan, as grease can splatter and cause the bottom to warp. Dishwasher safe.
SPECIFICATIONS: Package includes (1) black 15” diameter Ecolution Sol Paella Pan.
